mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ACM_SYS_ORG( CP_CODE, ORG_NAME, ORG_DESC, OID, OPERATOR, REMARK ) VALUES( #{cpCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: SELECT ID as id, CP_CODE as cpCode, ORG_NAME as orgName, ORG_DESC as orgDesc, OID as oid, OPERATOR as operator, CREATE_TIME as createTime, UPDATE_TIME as updateTime, REMARK as remark FROM ACM_SYS_ORG WHERE ID=#{id}
